title: Telegram post
excerpt:
Requested eu.org domain
‚Ü≥ Added ClouDNS NameServers for temporary access
‚Ü≥ Request accepted
‚Ü≥ Changing NS to CloudFlare ones
‚Ü≥ Made email forwarding for whole domain (MX & TXT records done)
‚Ü≥ Tried to host the website to some free providers, but all of them asks for changing the NS (which will make me loose benefits of CloudFlare)
‚Ü≥ Found that 000webhost can host a site without changing the NS, which seems cool
‚Ü≥ It needs to change the CNAME record, to make it pointing to the 000webhostapp subdomain. It's like a redirection, or an iframe. It's one url, showing the content of another one
‚Ü≥ CNAME records are not allowed at the zone apex (RFC 1034), so CNAME flattening is applied by CloudFlare. They change the CNAME into an A and AAAA record (by retrieving IPv4 and IPv6 adresses). Problem : they can't be retrieved
‚Ü≥ CNAME record existing but invalid, so not allowed by 000webhost...

title: Telegram post
excerpt:
<u>REGARDING TO MY BOTS (huge changes) </u>  
  
Let me give you the roadmap :  
  
‚Ä¢ @ytvideodownloaderbyedm115_bot is shut down  
The recent upload problems are yet another reason for me to do it  
The promised update will come, but seriously later than expected  as I have too much work for now  
I no longer provide any support for the old code. It have moved to @ytdl_byedm115_backupbot, and you can still use it in the group  
You can run your own version through webhook by running the following command : @ytdl_byedm115_backupbot clone {BOT_TOKEN} where {BOT_TOKEN} is what you got from @BotFather  
  
‚Ä¢ Regarding to @AllDownloaderbyedm115_bot  
Same, going to be discontinued. Code will no longer be updated, so it will stay bugged as it is   
As Google is shutting down Team Drives, it's useless  
Plus, the OAuth provider will end support in October 2022, so yeah  
Bot will become offline at 1st September 2022 and will be deleted at this date  
  
‚Ä¢ The brand new @unzip_edm115bot will stay updated and will continuously get new features as the time passes  
Once it will be done and fully stable, I'll start making something else  
  
  
Much love   
@EDM115...

title: Telegram post
excerpt:
MAJOR UPDATE   
Version 3.3.5 [stable]  
  
Changes :  
‚Ä¢ Merged beta branch  
‚Ä¢ Added a script to deploy to Heroku when needed (refer to this)  
‚Ä¢ Removed useless mentions of Nexa  
‚Ä¢ Added Python 3.9 runtime by default  
‚Ä¢ Added test functions for better ETA and humanbytes  
‚Ä¢ Overall graphic changes (less fancy fonts, less formatting, more emojis and more explicit buttons)  
‚Ä¢ Added file name in caption for uploads  
‚Ä¢ Better password support  
‚Ä¢ Downloaded URL is sent to logs in case URL has gone ~~(this slow down the extraction, will fix later)~~  
‚Ä¢ Unarchiving a password protected archive in normal mode no longer make hang up the bot  
‚Ä¢ Added /help and /about commands for every user  
‚Ä¢ Updaded /stats command for owner with uptame, total download and upload of the day  
‚Ä¢ Added /me, /addthumb and /delthumb commands for everyone (don't work for now)  
‚Ä¢ Added /user, /db, /dbdive, /redbutton, /restart and /cleanall commands for owner (don't work for now)  
  
Continue to use me, and report errors at @EDM115 to make this bot better...

title: Telegram post
excerpt:
Currently working on an update of my best bot   
  
@ytvideodownloaderbyedm115_bot will be updated to a 3.0 version soon‚Ä¶ (it can take up to 5 months so‚Ä¶ don't expect it for now )  
  
<u>Changes (what's planned) :</u>  
  
 Revamped interface  
 More user-friendly, emoji's  
 Less buttons (as example, m4a format has never been used)  
 Better logic while choosing quality (order of buttons reorganized)  
 Allow compressing videos to HEVC (H-265) codec  
 Allow to upload as zip  
 Completely rewrited code  
 Handling of playlist (no matter its size)  
 Handling of big files (if it's above 2 Gb, video will be splitted into parts)  
 Regarding to the 10-30s cooldown‚Ä¶ might be removed  
 Adding requested file formats (such as wav and mkv)  
 Removing checker.in links and @uploadbot dependency  
 Instead, adding a Google Drive support. Every file will also be uploaded there and an open link will be provided  
 Adding a /donate command   
 Better support in groups  
 User-based default settings  
 Automatic ban for flooders  
 No premium plans  
 Open-source code  
 Old code of the bot will be moved to another @  
  
<u>What will maybe come with the new version :</u>  
  
 Adding Dailymotion, Vimeo, etc‚Ä¶ support  
 Improving speed (√ó2)  
  
Follow to keep you up to date‚Ä¶...

title: Telegram post
excerpt:
Okay, so y'all have probably heard about this 10/10 critical security breach   
  
Here some sources about it :  
  
‚Ä¢ Run a vulnerable log4j instance (at your own risks !)  
‚Ä¢ Cloudflare blog article for a better understanding (complete, as usual )  
‚Ä¢ Another good article  
‚Ä¢ Some lists of IP's catched for using the breach [1] [2] (regularly updated)  
‚Ä¢ A vaccine for it  
‚Ä¢ fail2ban filter rule (blocks anyone who wants to use the exploit)  
‚Ä¢ Full list of infos/ressources about it   
‚Ä¢ Another complete list of ressources   
‚Ä¢ Tool for finding if the breach is present on your organization [tool made by the CISA ]  
‚Ä¢ Unusual : the exploit can be used through iPhones and Tesla   
‚Ä¢ A variant of the breach  
‚Ä¢ 6 months after, this flaw is still actively used  
  
The solution is obviously to update Apache   
Good luck if you're facing this...

title: Telegram post

title: Telegram post
excerpt:
You think bot is down ?  
Well, it's not ! Just facing some issues‚Ä¶   
  
<u>Symptoms :</u>  
‚Ä¢ Answer time might be delayed from 1s to ‚âà3-4s  
‚Ä¢ Upload time is way longer (nearly 4√ó)  
‚Ä¢ Download and merging time is unchanged  
  
<u>Why this happens ?</u>  
First, we got some server issues   
Then, we're close to Christmas, and the number of requests were multiplied by 12 in just a week   
So of course, it's harder for us to handle all of them  
  
<u>How to fix it ?</u>  
The main solution is to wait‚Ä¶ That's the better thing to do  
If you waited more than 15mins, send once again the link to the bot, and choose exactly the same quality/format than previously. It will just restart the upload from where it stopped (because yes, due to high demand, the bot can sometimes "forget" your upload on the stack‚Ä¶  So just reminds him gently that you're waiting for your file, and he will complete the upload )  
  
Thanks for your understanding   
Subscribe to keep yourself up to date concerning this bot, its evolving and the future of other ones‚Ä¶...

‚Ä¢ If you retry to download the same video in the same quality/format, the bot won't re-download it twice, but will only keep 1 process in the stack...

title: Telegram post
excerpt:
EVERYONE MUST READ   
  
#storytime yep  
So, WHY the bot was acting weirdly those days ?  
Lemme explain you. Some ~~dumbass~~ stupid users think that they can "kill" the bot (or our servers) by sending a loooot of requests‚Ä¶  
  
I must say one thing :  
FLOOD / SPAM IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN !!!  
  
What is that ?  
Spamming, is sending a lot of requests that have nothing to do with my bot. By security, the bot never reply to an URL that is NOT from YouTube.  
Flooding, is sending too many requests that the bot CAN'T handle. Like downloading 200 videos in 8K at the same time (this happened just today‚Ä¶ ). The bot actually have a kind of cooldown, don't worry‚Ä¶   
  
From now, every user that flood/spam is definitely banned from using the bot. Thanks for understanding...

title: Telegram post
excerpt:
#changelog : new in 2.0  
Hell yeah, we move on a new version   
So 1st, speed is always improved, but‚Ä¶ that's not the most interesting‚Ä¶  
This major update have a brand new functionality : you're now able to download restricted videos   
Means that you can download videos normally unavailable for you (i.e. because you need to have +18 or it's restricted for your country).  
Also, I'm working for a bug fix : currently, if you download a video in portrait format (i.e. Shorts) in MKV format, it will be downloaded as paysage‚Ä¶  But no problem for MP4.  
I'm also working on YT premium content (like movies), private, and deleted videos.  
  
Enjoy...
